html:
2.16.20  10:36 pm   where did you get all the inspiration to make your own style of videos?

     simply out of necessity

2.16.20  10:30 pm   you know that you've mispelled "questions" into "ueqstions" on this part of the website right? (i've accidentally sent a question earlier so here's the full version)

     it's not ueqstions, it's ueqstions and do you think the bright green color of the letter q signifies my awareness or na

2.16.20  10:24 pm   BILL HOW DO I TURN CAPS LOCK OFF PLEASE HELP ME IM SCARED

     i don't believe you

2.16.20  10:06 pm   what's a wall

     very difficult to describe, but it's like a blindfold for the entire room

2.16.20  9:57 pm   Should I buy a 47 pound bucket of Mac and cheese 

     no

2.16.20  9:48 pm   if capitalism took over the entire world and you had to go to space to escape it, what and who would you bring with you?

     the earth's atmostphere

      also what's your favorite color for pants

     surprise me

2.16.20  9:38 pm   Do you know why cursors on computers are hands?

     they were trying to simulate the user's hands

2.16.20  9:38 pm   What do bananas like to do in their spare time?

     grow very large

2.16.20  9:37 pm   Are you human?

     oh that would explain a lot

2.16.20  9:26 pm   favorite kind of pop tart?

     slop tart (that's the one with all frosting, nothing else)

2.16.20  9:09 pm   Why is yes?

     for affirmative purposes

2.16.20  8:50 pm   At the end of the video "ball & stick" why did you make the end sound like it was either watered down or VERY drugged?

     it's supposed to sound dreamy. made it sound dreamy because dreaminess is nice, or at least i must have thought so at the time

2.16.20  8:48 pm   How much longer until your next video?

     what i am more concerned with is how much time there will be between the next one and the next one after that

2.16.20  8:44 pm   are you a conventional musician, asking for a friend

     yes but no

2.16.20  8:11 pm   Are you real

     oh that would explain a lot

2.16.20  7:56 pm   whats your favorite flavor of ice cream

      communist manifesto

2.16.20  7:38 pm   Favorite fruit and vegetable

     tomato

2.16.20  7:06 pm   much excitement surrounds your triumphant return

     fair enough

2.16.20  6:55 pm   Is everything art?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.16.20  6:45 pm   Would you consider being a guest on The Official Podcast?

     sure

2.16.20  6:18 pm   Hey. Any bees around here?

     no

2.16.20  6:17 pm   as a drummer, i must know: heel up or heel down?

     as a drummer, you are the one who gets to decide

2.16.20  6:11 pm   Do you like travelling?

     yes

2.16.20  6:10 pm   how do i assess what counts as small and/or short?

     is it bigger than a bread box

      do the small things get tinier (at least how i perceive them) over time with practice, or...?

     small and large are relative terms, so there is no need to be too worried about it. besides ... incorrect assessments can be a source of comedy/humour

      how do you deal with the unsatisfying feeling of having done something so small that it feels insignificant?

     the only thing i can suggest is to try to do something bigger

     how do you deal with the overwhelming feeling that you're not doing enough or that there never will be a point where enough will have been done?

     freak out

      ... deadlines?

     yes, there are times when that is a good solution

2.16.20  6:05 pm   hey, so can you help me with this? i've come to a point in my life where i just don't get my purpose, and/or don't see where i fit into this society. i guess i could say who cares about fitting in, but it's more of i just don't get what's the point of the daily activities in my life. i'm not depressed or anything, just don't really get why i'm here to do everything i do on a day-to-day basis. is there anything i can do to find purpose in my life? maybe spice things up a bit? i don't really know how, i've thought of moving out to a big city myself away from my family but i don't see that changing much when it comes to finding purpose. do you have any suggestions?

     you could try to figure out how gravity works ..... it seems so simple and it is so tempting to figure it out, and yet no one has yet

2.16.20  5:50 pm   do you ever worry that the people you are trying to fight are actually manipulating you into fighting them or doing other things?

     that would make sense. fortunately i am not currently trying to fight anyone

2.16.20  5:22 pm   What editing software do you use?

     we'll see

2.16.20  5:16 pm   what are your opinions on clowns?

      more people are clowns than you think (and more clowns are people than you think)

2.16.20  4:54 pm   when do you think you will uplod your next video

     i'm having a countdown timer

2.16.20  4:30 pm   Why is space?

     perfect remedy for claustrophobia

2.16.20  3:00 pm   Chairs are aggressive,

     that's not true. they are one of the least aggressive things there is. you are twisting the facts

      why?

2.16.20  2:53 pm   What's the most favorite song you've done?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.16.20  2:27 pm   What's the opposite of nothing?

     literally anything

2.16.20  2:25 pm   What kind of editing software do you use?

     we'll see

2.16.20  1:52 pm   have you reached the pinnacle of creativity

     no

2.16.20  1:29 pm   how is 2020 so far

     pretty good, but i keep getting the year and century mixed up

2.16.20  1:16 pm   How did you learn to sing?

     i'm not sure, but i'm still learning

     Is it natural or did you do voice coaching?

     natural is the only way i know how

2.16.20  12:39 pm   anything new with you

     yes

2.16.20  12:29 pm   What investment advice do you have for a 6 month old baby?

     learn to walk

2.16.20  10:33 am   Is music a universal language?

     it communicates feelings much more than information

2.16.20  10:29 am   opinion on dinosaurs?

     they'd be better if they weren't so fuckin extinct

2.16.20  9:53 am   is life pain

     it may contain pain

2.16.20  9:49 am   can a piano be shaved

     absolutely not

2.16.20  9:24 am   did you make it to south pole on 1.31.2019?

     i must have, because i finished that video and released it, and it does indeed have the south pole in it

2.16.20  8:53 am   Are you learning anything new? 

     yes

2.16.20  8:36 am   Bill, how can you fly without wings?

     could try a jet pack

2.16.20  8:26 am   Am I mentally unstable?

     not quite

2.16.20  7:08 am   When will your next video be up?

     i am having a countdown timer

     And will it have 3D animations?

     that seems guaranteed

2.16.20  4:37 am   Do you sometimes get bored from the work?

     no

     Btw you have great Talent! 

     holy montvale, you are very friendly

2.16.20  3:33 am   Are you still learning that 3d animation sotware?

     yes, and teaching it things
